publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2007 Richard Lochhead: Gutted—That the Parliament notes the recent success of the documentary "Gutted" at the BAFTA Scotland awards; sends its congratulations to all those involved in producing the documentary and its stars, and calls for the BBC to repeat the programme in Scotland and screen it throughout the United Kingdom following its success.

S2M-2007 Gutted (lodged on 15 November 2004) Robin Harper*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Tricia Marwick*, Christine Grahame*, Stewart Stevenson*, Brian Adam*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Bruce Crawford*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Michael Matheson*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2007 Gutted (lodged on 15 November 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-2007 Gutted (lodged on 15 November 2004) Colin Fox*

S2M-2007 Richard Lochhead: Gutted—That the Parliament notes the recent success of the documentary "Gutted" at the BAFTA Scotland awards; sends its congratulations to all those involved in producing the documentary and its stars, and calls for the BBC to repeat the programme in Scotland and screen it throughout the United Kingdom following its success. Supported by: Robin Harper, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Christine Grahame, Stewart Stevenson, Brian Adam, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Adam Ingram, Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Michael Matheson, Ms Sandra White, Alex Neil, Colin Fox
